name: Quarantine
description: Quarantine is an intense turn-based strategy game about waging war on pandemic disease. Recruit a team of specialized operatives to deploy on worldwide missions. Research the contagion, upgrade your tech, and quarantine the outbreak before it kills us all.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 or newer, 32-bit 处理器: i3-2125 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: 2 GB VRAM DirectX 版本: 10 网络: 宽带互联网连接 存储空间: 需要 5 GB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 10 64-bit 处理器: i5-2405S 内存: 8 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770, 2 GB VRAM DirectX 版本: 12 网络: 宽带互联网连接 存储空间: 需要 5 GB 可用空间
